name: Internal
description:
Short RPG game made as a two week self challenge.
Features Nihilistic rants about how futile life is,
Shitty mechanics, some terrible music & art.

Will be updating over the next couple of days. :)
Enjoy.

- Changes as of V1.60 -

Added in functionality not available in V1.10.

Added timed cut scene accessible from home.

Added fates & sins.
